description: Triangle read by rows T(n,k), n>=1, k>=1, in which column k starts in row A002620(k+1). If k is odd the column k lists j's interleaved with (k-1)/2 zeros, where j = (k+1)/2. Otherwise, if k is even the column k lists the positive integers but starting from k/2+1, interleaved with (k-2)/2 zeros.
